thread.title: Aida
thread.title_full: David Sklar & Associates Inc. reviewed by Aida

author: Aida
title: Aida
text:
I would love to recommend David Sklar & Associates to anyone because this company is really nice with great staff. They will guided you everything and work for you so diligently. Everything's so easy and no hasle. Very excellent and very fast n service. I would like to thank all the staff especially Cory.
Thank you so very much David Sklar for helping mo out of my debt and making my life worry free.
